subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sergio Agüero is a big hit with Manchester City fans, as his goal gave the team the Premier League title. But his father-in-law, Diego Maradona, is reviled in England.
snippet: Sergio Agüero is a big hit with Manchester City fans, as his goal gave the team the Premier League title. But his father-in-law, Diego Maradona, is reviled in England.
